TopicTitle: Hello to the forum...mistakes already made!

Articles.Content:
Hello to everyone here, After months of watching youtube video's and reading stories about the game I decided that the current steam sale left me no excuse but to pick it up!. already started my career...well..umm...Jebediah Kerman isn't going to be coming home....ever, It all started fine..but I attached one too many engines to my last rocket...I forgot on getting him back down again...he's just floating off. I kind of feel bad.

But back on to the drawing board, I hope to get many hours out of this addicting piece of software!

Hello Kegaran, and welcome to the forum!

If Jeb is still alive, you can always send a rescue mission later.  Fortunately, life support is not modelled in the game atm, so he'll be fine until you can go and pick him up.

I have no doubt that you will find much enjoyment in both the game and the community here.

Happy landings!

Don't feel bad, Jeb's always fine with whatever you throw at him!... or how far you throw him.
Welcome!

My first sandbox save's Jeb is living proof that rescue from accidental solar orbit is possible.

Welcome!

It's ok. His green skin has photosynthesis!

And welcome to this amazing place!
Jeb might be happy being offduty for a while. Prepare a rescuemission.

.

Edited April 25 by SurrealShock
